title: SpongeBob SquarePants, The Movie (Bigger. Squarier. Spongier. More Absorbant.)
body: The <a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0345950/">SpongeBob movie</a> will be 90 minutes of SpongeBob trying to find King Neptune's Crown.  Aside from the usual cast from the show it looks like the movie will star Alec Baldwin.  It should be out just in time for Thanksgiving.  The <a href="http://www.movie-list.com/trailers.php?id=spongebobsquarepants">trailers are pretty funny</a>. (Was that <em>Hunt For The Red October</em>??)
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-07-27
